knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
packages = c('tmap', 'SpatialAcc',
             'sf', 'ggstatsplot',
             'tidyverse')

for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
